lead_paragraph: Neutral diplomatic quarters in London reported yesterday that Portugal was contemplating a declaration of war against Japan and might follow it with declarations against other Axis powers, according to The United Press.
abstract: Portugal reptd ready to declare war on Japan; declaration on other Axis powers held likely
